member.name: T:Microsoft.Xbox.GameChat.ChatManager
member.summary: Manages a chat session.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xbox.GameChat.ChatManager.#ctor(Microsoft.Xbox.GameChat.ChatSessionPeriod)
member.summary: Initializes a ChatManager object with a specified chat session period
member.param: The chat session period to use. Larger buffers add latency, but may improve overall performance.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xbox.GameChat.ChatManager.#ctor(Microsoft.Xbox.GameChat.ChatSessionPeriod,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a ChatManager object with a specified chat session period and title enforced privilege and privacy value.
member.param: The chat session period, in milliseconds, to use. Larger buffers add latency, but may improve overall performance.

Indicates whether or not a title is taking ownership of privilege and privacy checks. True indicates that a title is taking ownership - the underlying Chat library will create no communication restrictions based on privileges or privacy. When taking ownership, the title must maintain XR compliance. False indicates that GameChat will continue to enforce these restrictions. This value cannot be modified during the lifetime of a chat session. To change the value, the ChatManager must be recreated.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xbox.GameChat.ChatManager.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a ChatManager object using a default ChatSessionPeriod of 40 milliseconds.

A collection of the local users to add.

member.param: The unique console identifier for the chat.

member.summary: Processes incoming chat messages.

member.summary: Mutes a non-friend chat user who fails a reputation check, that is, a user who is considered to have a bad reputation.
member.param: An object representing a remote user.

member.summary: Unmutes all users from all chat channels.

The user to remove.

member.summary: The audio thread priority class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xbox.GameChat.ChatManagerSettings.AutoMuteBadReputationUsers

member.summary: The lowest acceptable packet count in the jitter buffer.

member.summary: The maximum packet count for the jitter buffer.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xbox.GameChat.ChatManagerSettings.JitterBufferPacketsBeforeRelaxingNeeded
member.summary: The packet count before relaxing in the jitter buffer.

member.summary: A value that indicates if the Kinect Sensor is the capture source.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xbox.GameChat.ChatManagerSettings.PostDecodeCallbackEnabled
member.summary: A value that indicates if the system raises the ChatManager.OnPostDecodeAudioBuffer Event, which allows titles to apply sound effects to chat voice data.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xbox.GameChat.ChatManagerSettings.PerformanceCountersEnabled
member.summary: A value that indicates if performance counters are enabled.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xbox.GameChat.ChatManagerSettings.PreEncodeCallbackEnabled
member.summary: A value that indicates if the system raises the ChatManager.OnPreEncodeAudioBuffer Event, which allows titles to apply sound effects to the capture stream.

member.summary: The user is talking with a headset microphone.

member.name: F:TalkingOverKinect
member.summary: The user is talking with the sensor microphone.

member.name: F:Info
member.summary: Tracing debugging information.

member.name: F:Off
member.summary: Not tracing.

member.name: F:Verbose
member.summary: Giving verbose trace information.

member.name: F:Warning
